body.name: Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair with Seat Slider, 4D Pillow Lumbar Support Height & Depth Adjustment, Tilt Lock, Adjustable Headrest & Armrest, Curved Cushion Computer Chair Home Office Desk Chairs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 24 mins
features: Customize Your Comfort - People have comfort requirements for their different body structures. You can free to move the headrest, armrests, seat depth, lumbar support, seat height, and tilt tension of the ergonomic office chair. They encourage more movement and allow multiple people to find optimal comfort when sedentary at a desk

Desk Chair With Seat Slider - Innovative seat depth adjustment allows you to adjust the distance between your seat and the back of the task chair. The seat sliding feature can offer better back support to you as it ensures that your back is correctly pressed against the backrest. It also can spread your weight across the seat’s surface to relieve pressure from the back of the knees

4D Ergonomic Lumbar Pillow - Built-in lumbar support pillow is the upgraded feature of our ergonomic chairs. Free to adjust the lumbar height (up & down) and lumbar depth (forward & backward). It features a contoured lower back support that moves as you do and helps your spine receive the correct support it needs in a variety of sitting postures

Multifunction Tilt-lock - 90°- 130° tilt lock allows you to lock the seat at different angles. You can sit in an upright position for keyboarding, while providing a comfortable rocking/reclining motion for relaxing

3D Headrest Support - The Mesh headrest is also adjustable in two directions (lifting &reclining), so you can put that right where you like it as well. Provides optimal support for your head and neck area

Comfortable Big Ergonomic Chair - The seat cushion of our office chairs for heavy people is 20% larger than other office chairs. Properly padded high elastic seat cushion can avoid misalignments in the hips and back issues, offers lasting comfort all day, will not collapse after prolonged use. Breathable mesh material allows air to circulate allows you to sit focused and relaxed

Reliable Service - This home office desk chair passed the BIFMA Test and the SGS Test. Once you choose YONISEE, you will get easy-to-understand instruction and worry-free after-sales service. Please feel free to contact us if you encounter any problems. We are concerned and dedicated to your experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, great for back support
reviews.reviewText: I do like the chair. I purchased the upgraded wheels to help maneuver the chair around. I did have to add a cushion to the seat, I like the cushion on my bottom for back pain. The ability to move the seat forward and back is great. The hand rests adjust easily and do not seem to be loosening like others.

reviews.reviewerName: Bottom Line Up FrontBottom Line Up Front
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to install but nice chair once you get it done
reviews.reviewText: I really like this chair but it arrived in a box that was severely damaged. No parts were missing but it looked like the box had been crushed. There was one piece (see picture) that was damaged but the piece is so malleable that it wasn’t an issue. It was also a cosmetic piece.Installation took around 45 minutes. The directions are relatively straightforward but there’s a part where it doesn’t differentiate between a left and right piece. However, the piece only goes in one way so if one piece doesn’t work, just try the other.The other issue is putting the back plastic piece with the mesh backing. You need to use a lot of force to put them together. It’s much harder than it should be.As for the chair, I love it a lot-it’s comfortable ans it rolls around great. One improvement I would want is the ability to easily adjust the height of the arm rests. There’s a button on the side to adjust them but because it’s stiff, you need to use two hands to adjust it.Overall I recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent office chair and easy to put together.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to replace my old office chair. I decided on this one and found that it was easy to assemble in just a few short minutes following the easy to read instructions. I like the easy to adjust headrest and lumbar support. The chair pads is soft and I can sit for longer times without becoming uncomfortable. Adjustable arms rest really round out the ensemble. Out with the old chair and in with the new more comfortable chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is such a nice chair. The wheels spin smoothly and the seat is super comfortable. The head rest is an added bonus for sure. Not sure how much it will really be used, since I am working at a computer when sitting in the chair, but nice to have it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son spends pretty much most of his life in his office chair (between studying and gaming) - it's important that he has a comfortable chair with decent back support - something that his previous chair didn't provide. This chair, once assembled, is a delight to sit in! It can be fully adjusted to provide a personalised level of seating support that is extremely comfortable. The seat can move forwards and backwards, whilst the armrests also move up/down. The chair can be lowered/highered and the lumbar support panel can be adjusted for the required level of support needed. Was it easy to assemble? It wasn't too bad, although there's quite a lot of parts so be prepared and some of the threads for the screws could be better, making assembly a little fiddly - some screws had trouble taking initially. It does come with everything needed though.Sadly we did find that there's one piece that covers the screws on the back of the chair that wouldn't fit - the shape of the piece wouldn't fit in the gap provided and we had to leave it off. Thankfully it doesn't affect the working of the chair however, and is purely cosmetic. It's a lovely chair with some great support features - my son loves it. He'll be able to study (and game) in comfort from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable to sit for long hours
reviews.reviewText: Sitting on chair for long hours is not easy but this chair made it easy. I have noticed significant difference in my comfort after replacing my old chair with this chair. I can adjust almost every aspect of this chair to fit my body perfectly which made this chair comfortable for long hours. I don't get tired and don't feel any pain in any part of my body as before after using this chair. Especially the lumbar support, it has custom fit cushion like supporting my lower back. The headrest can be adjusted too.Easy to move around as the wheels are smooth to move. Overall material of the chair looks durable and sturdy. Looks like don't have to buy another for at least 10 years ahead.

reviews.reviewerName: You live only onceYou live only once
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took me a while to put the chair together, it came in a huge box so just prepare yourself if you have to take it up the stairs.Make sure you have at least 1 hour and a bit of space around you because you will need it.It comes with all the tools you will need to assemble the chair and ..you got to arm yourself with patience because you will need it as some of the screws will only fit sideways etc...however overall it is a good chair which is surprisingly given the fact that it is under £100, its really comfy especially the bit at the lower back.Overall I would recommend it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and use. Offers great support for the back and comfortable. Item arrived very well packed, so excellent start, perfect size and more important top quality looks and feels great , for the price can’t fault it, 10 out of 10 from me very happy indeed and would purchase again 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice Office Chair with Armrest and Adjustable HeadrestThe is easy to install following the provided instructionsI got it to renew my old office chair, I can feel a difference already this chair comes with curved pad support which makes it more comfortable use.The chair is stable, solid with good quality meshingOverall, slightly overpriced, but good quality!
